医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过因果发现和图神经网络推进基因调控网络推理基因调控网络（GRN）将细胞系统内基因的调控机制描述为网络，为理解决定细胞表型的细胞过程和分子相互作用提供了重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Advancing-gene-regulatory-network-inference-with-causal-discovery-and-graph-neural-networks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Advancing-gene-regulatory-network-inference-with-causal-discovery-and-graph-neural-networks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12b37331-0b5e-4c28-9f86-c54572a368df Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:27:00 -0500 Advancing gene regulatory network inference with causal discovery and graph neural networks
研究显示，近三分之一的成年人难以达到建议的睡眠时间这是官方的。弗林德斯大学专家发现，31% 的成年人的平均睡眠时间超出了建议范围，目前近三分之一的人口无法获得建议的每晚 7-9 小时的睡眠时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Nearly-one-third-of-adults-struggle-to-meet-recommished-sleep-duration-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Nearly-one-third-of-adults-struggle-to-meet-recommended-sleep-duration-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c4e3dd9-4b93-4e09-8fae-15344dcc1c13 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:24:50 -0500 Nearly one-third of adults struggle to meet recommended sleep duration, study reveals
研究人员利用来自贻贝和蚕的蛋白质开发双层粘合止血剂最近的新闻中，曾发生过一例患者因涉及缝合的外科手术而感到疼痛，导致纱布无意中出现在患者体内的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Researchers-develop-bilayer-adhesive-hemostat-using- Proteins-driven-from-mussels-and-silkworms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Researchers-develop-bilayer-adhesive-hemostat-using- Proteins-driven-from-mussels-and-silkworms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=670e3d25-29bc-4c0a-a55f-a765336cb715 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:16:28 -0500 Researchers develop bilayer adhesive hemostat using proteins derived from mussels and silkworms
监狱里总是缺乏怀孕护理。情况可能会变得更糟。 2022 年 6 月午夜左右，警察出现在安吉拉·科利尔 (Angela Collier) 家门口，告诉她有人匿名要求进行福利检查，因为他们认为她可能流产了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Pregnancy-care-was-always-lacking-in-jails-It-could-get-worse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Pregnancy-care-was-always-lacking-in-jails-It-could-get-worse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bc3a051-6c64-4841-b99b-a95b7e955a91 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 06:00:44 -0500 Pregnancy care was always lacking in jails. It could get worse.
佛罗里达州在麻疹疫情中藐视疾病预防控制中心，告诉家长可以将未接种疫苗的孩子送去学校佛罗里达州卫生局局长约瑟夫·拉达波（Joseph Ladapo）在一份简短的备忘录中颠覆了长期以来控制麻疹疫情的公共卫生标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Florida-defies-CDC-in-measles-outbreak-telling-parents-ite28099s-fine-to-send-unvaccinated-kids-to-school.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Florida-defies-CDC-in-measles-outbreak-telling-parents-ite28099s-fine-to-send-unvaccinated-kids-to-school.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83082a81-f409-4d48-9cf5-dd206e1605af Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:53:37 -0500 Florida defies CDC in measles outbreak, telling parents it’s fine to send unvaccinated kids to school
Optibrium 在其 StarDrop 平台中实现协作设计新的创意跟踪器功能通过支持项目管理、创意共享和分子设计跟踪进一步提高了药物发现的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Optibrium-enables-collaborative-design-in-its-StarDrop-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Optibrium-enables-collaborative-design-in-its-StarDrop-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bf53c16-0eb4-4046-bbbc-400dee755c46 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:51:00 -0500 Optibrium enables collaborative design in its StarDrop platform
使用 INTEGRA 移液器开发新型诺如病毒候选疫苗INTEGRA Biosciences 向 HilleVax 赠送了 50 个 EVOLVE 手动移液器、价值 1000 美元的 GRIPTIPS® 移液器吸头以及各种实验室配件，帮助推进其诺如病毒疫苗开发的开创性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Developing-a-novel-norovirus-vaccine-candidate-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Developing-a-novel-norovirus-vaccine-candidate-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c64db4dc-7943-42a1-90b0-a4726cc6bf7a Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:48:00 -0500 Developing a novel norovirus vaccine candidate with INTEGRA pipettes
研究发现红光疗法可显着降低血糖峰值通过口服葡萄糖耐量测试，使用 670 nm 波长的红光影响血浆中的循环葡萄糖水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Red-light-therapy-shown-to-significantly-reduce-blood-sugar-spikes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Red-light-therapy-shown-to-significantly-reduce-blood-sugar-spikes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a9f11e8-15cd-4c72-91bd-219d8315af4a Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:42:00 -0500 Red light therapy shown to significantly reduce blood sugar spikes, study finds
新研究定义了感染后 ME/CFS 的临床表型，强调了独特的生物标志物见解PI肌痛性脑炎/慢性疲劳综合征（ME/CFS）的病理生理机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/New-study-defines-clinical-phenotype-of-Post-infectious-MECFS-highlighting-unique-biomarker-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/New-study-defines-clinical-phenotype-of-Post-infectious-MECFS-highlighting-unique-biomarker-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df72db3a-387d-4e12-ac80-2a1df0b792f8 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 05:06:00 -0500 New study defines clinical phenotype of Post-infectious ME/CFS, highlighting unique biomarker insights
研究发现，儿童早期食欲特征与青少年饮食失调有关幼儿期食欲品质与青春期饮食问题症状之间的纵向关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Early-childhood-appetite-traits-linked-to-adolescent-eating-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Early-childhood-appetite-traits-linked-to-adolescent-eating-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a7bfdad-7ab3-4368-a043-a3b090cbe89a Fri, 23 Feb 2024 04:24:00 -0500 Early childhood appetite traits linked to adolescent eating disorders, study finds
